itemInfo.itemDesc: A Gathering Tool made for storing water.\n- Usage: Can be used to collect water on the beach or along rivers.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec

item.name: Empty Bottle
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for storing water.\n- Usage: Can be used to collect water on the beach or along rivers.\n- Standard Gathering Time

item.name: Melted Silver Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Silver Ore.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.
